headline: Citi Initiates Buy on Roper (ROP), Citing AI Opportunities
summary: Roper Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROP) is one of the best tech stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On August 19, Citi analyst George Kurosawa initiated coverage on Roper Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROP) with a Buy rating and a price target of $626. As of September 2, the stock was trading at $517.59, which means Kurosawa’s implied upside […]

headline: DAT adds cargo van, box truck, and power-only categories to DAT One
summary: BEAVERTON, Ore., September 04, 2025--DAT Freight & Analytics has added eight new load and equipment categories to the DAT One load board, including Sprinter-style cargo van, box truck, and power-only load options.
